Package com.example.maritimemetrics.service

Class MaritimeMetricStatisticsService

java.lang.Object
com.example.maritimemetrics.service.MaritimeMetricStatisticsService
@Service public class MaritimeMetricStatisticsService extends Object
Service class for performing statistical calculations and retrieving metrics related to maritime data.

      Returns:

      Returns:
      the median speed difference

    • compareVesselSpeedMedians

      public String compareVesselSpeedMedians(String vesselCode1, String vesselCode2)
      Compares the median speed differences of two vessels.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode1 - the code of the first vessel
      vesselCode2 - the code of the second vessel
      Returns:
      the vessel code of the vessel with the lower median speed difference, or "equal" if they are the same

    • getSpeedOutliers

      public List<MaritimeMetric> getSpeedOutliers(String vesselCode, double speedThreshold)
      Retrieves speed outliers for a specific vessel based on a given threshold.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the code of the vessel
      speedThreshold - the threshold for determining speed outliers
      Returns:
      a list of MaritimeMetric objects that are considered speed outliers

    • getFuelOutliers

      public List<MaritimeMetric> getFuelOutliers(String vesselCode, double fuelThreshold)
      Retrieves fuel outliers for a specific vessel based on a given threshold.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the code of the vessel
      fuelThreshold - the threshold for determining fuel outliers
      Returns:
      a list of MaritimeMetric objects that are considered fuel outliers

    • getConsecutiveProblematicGroups

      public List<List<MaritimeMetric>> getConsecutiveProblematicGroups(String vesselCode, String problemType)
      Retrieves consecutive groups of problematic waypoints for a specific problem type.
      Parameters:
      vesselCode - the code of the vessel
      problemType - the type of problem to filter by (e.g., "missing", "belowzero", "outlier")
      Returns:
      a list of lists containing consecutive MaritimeMetric objects with the specified problem
